resources.string: The file selected is not a TiddlyWiki
Are you sure you want to remove this Wiki from Tiddloid?
The wiki selected no longer exists. Do you want to remove it?
Unsaved changes detected. Are you sure you want to quit?
The page is trying to start another application. Do you want to continue?

Tiddloid Lite, a lightweight version of Tiddloid, is an app to work with locally stored TiddlyWikis. Once have some ideas, you can immediately write them down so that you can access them anywhere. For more details of TiddlyWiki, please see https://tiddlywiki.com/ .
